overview: Joanna Baker has been on the founding teams of two successful ventures and has over 4 years of experience working in finance. After starting her career at Goldman Sachs as a Financial Analyst, Ms. Baker joined the founding team of Soleil Securities, where she helped lead the development of the Institutional Investment Research Division. Ms. Baker then went on to Co-Found and successfully launch Q Magazine in print and online as Co-Chief Editor. Ms. Baker also has recent experience working in the merchant banking division at Allen & Company, where she focused on new media, communications and technology companies. Ms. Baker holds an MBA from Harvard University and a BA in Economics from Dartmouth University.
